warning.version: This build was created for an older game version and may be outdated.

home.title: Welcome to Lelanation !
home.description: Find the great Lelariva, look for the best build for your champion

dictionnaire-proposition.title: Propose a new definition
dictionnaire-proposition.explanation: You can propose a new definition for the Laranguiva dictionary. Your proposal will be reviewed before being added. Thank you for contributing to enriching our language!

legal.title: Legal Notice and Privacy Policy
legal.description: Lelanation is a website that allows you to find and share the best builds for League of Legends champions. It is designed and maintained by the gaming community.
legal.data-controller-info: This site is operated by a private individual for non-commercial purposes. Contact: via the site's contact form.
legal.legal-base-content: Personal data processing on this site is based on:
legal.legal-base-consent: Your free and informed consent (art. 6.1.a GDPR) for contact data
legal.legal-base-legitimate: Legitimate interest (art. 6.1.f GDPR) for anonymized traffic statistics
legal.data-contact: Name and message via contact form (optional)
legal.data-builds: League of Legends builds you create (stored locally)
legal.cookies-description: We only use your browser's local storage (localStorage) to:
legal.save: Save your custom builds on your device
legal.remember: Remember that you have accepted these terms
legal.no-tracking: No tracking or advertising cookies are used
legal.no-third-party: No data is transmitted to third parties for commercial purposes
legal.iconify: Iconify Design (iconify.design) for icon display - No personal data transmitted
legal.riot-api: Riot Games public API for League of Legends game data
legal.duration-local: Indefinitely in your browser's local storage (under your control)
legal.duration-contact: Contact messages: 1 year maximum then automatic deletion
legal.your-rights-description: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
legal.right-access: Access: Know what data we have about you
legal.right-portability: Portability: Get your data in a standard format
legal.right-withdraw: Withdraw consent: Change your mind at any time
legal.rights-exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us via the contact form
legal.security-no-db: No central database containing your personal data
legal.delete: Clear all your local data by clearing browser cache
legal.delete2: Reset your preferences at any time
legal.delete3: Delete your builds through the interface
legal.delete4: Contact administrator to delete your contact messages
legal.shared-builds: Shared builds are under Creative Commons license (free sharing)
legal.league-of-legends: League of Legends is a registered trademark of Riot Games, Inc.
legal.champions-data: Champion and item data comes from the official Riot Games API
legal.no-link: This site is independent and not affiliated with Riot Games
legal.riot-disclaimer: Lelanation is not endorsed by Riot Games and does not reflect the views or opinions of Riot Games or anyone officially involved in producing or managing Riot Games properties. Riot Games and all associated properties are trademarks or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc.
legal.contact-authority-info: In case of dispute, you can contact your local data protection authority
legal.last-update: Last update of this policy: December 2024

stats.disclaimer: Calculations are based on official data and wiki formulas, but may contain errors
